IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE name = 'SP_GenerateLumARAgedPeriod' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[SP_GenerateLumARAgedPeriod] GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[SP_GenerateLumARAgedPeriod] @ConditionPeriodID Char(6), @CompanyID int, @RepeatTimes int
AS BEGIN --Truncate table Truncate Table [dbo].[LumARAgedPeriod]
DECLARE @PeriodID Char(6) SET @PeriodID = @ConditionPeriodID DECLARE @RepeatStart int SET @RepeatStart = 1
WHILE(@RepeatStart <= @RepeatTimes) BEGIN INSERT INTO LumARAgedPeriod ([CompanyID], [ConditionPeriodID]) VALUES (@CompanyID, @PeriodID);
--Current UPDATE LumARAgedPeriod SET [Current] = (SELECT SUM(ARBalance) FROM Func_LumARAgedPeriod(@PeriodID, @CompanyID) WHERE DiffDays <= 0) WHERE [CompanyID] = @CompanyID and [ConditionPeriodID] = @PeriodID and [LineNbr] = @RepeatStart /* or (ARReDocType <> 'INV' and ARReDocType <> 'CRM' and ARPaymentAdjDate <= DateAdd(day, -1, DateAdd(month, 1 ,Convert(date, @PeriodID + '01')))) or (ARReDocType = 'CRM' and ARPaymentAdjDate <= DateAdd(day, -1, DateAdd(month, 1 ,Convert(date, @PeriodID + '01'))) and ARPaymentAdjFinPeriodID = 202106) */ --Others UPDATE LumARAgedPeriod SET --[OneMDays] 1 - 30 Days [OneMDays] = IsNull((select SUM(ARBalance) from Func_LumARAgedPeriod(@PeriodID, @CompanyID) where DiffDays > 0 and DiffDays <= 30), 0), --[TwoMDays] 31 - 60 Days [TwoMDays] = IsNull((select SUM(ARBalance) from Func_LumARAgedPeriod(@PeriodID, @CompanyID) where DiffDays > 30 and DiffDays <= 60), 0), --[ThreeMDays] 61 - 90 Days [ThreeMDays] = IsNull((select SUM(ARBalance) from Func_LumARAgedPeriod(@PeriodID, @CompanyID) where DiffDays > 60 and DiffDays <= 90), 0), --[FourMDays] 91 - 120 Days [FourMDays] = IsNull((select SUM(ARBalance) from Func_LumARAgedPeriod(@PeriodID, @CompanyID) where DiffDays > 90 and DiffDays <= 120), 0), --[FiveMDays] 121 - 150 Days [FiveMDays] = IsNull((select SUM(ARBalance) from Func_LumARAgedPeriod(@PeriodID, @CompanyID) where DiffDays > 120 and DiffDays <= 150), 0), --[SixMDays] 151 - 180 Days [SixMDays] = IsNull((select SUM(ARBalance) from Func_LumARAgedPeriod(@PeriodID, @CompanyID) where DiffDays > 150 and DiffDays <= 180), 0), --[SevenMDays] 181 - 210 Days [SevenMDays] = IsNull((select SUM(ARBalance) from Func_LumARAgedPeriod(@PeriodID, @CompanyID) where DiffDays > 180 and DiffDays <= 210), 0), --[OverSevenMDays] Over 210 Days [OverSevenMDays] = IsNull((select SUM(ARBalance) from Func_LumARAgedPeriod(@PeriodID, @CompanyID) where DiffDays > 210), 0) WHERE [CompanyID] = @CompanyID and [ConditionPeriodID] = @PeriodID and [LineNbr] = @RepeatStart
--Total UPDATE LumARAgedPeriod SET [Total] = [Current] + [OneMDays] + [TwoMDays] + [ThreeMDays] + [FourMDays] + [FiveMDays] + [SixMDays] + [SevenMDays] + [OverSevenMDays] WHERE [CompanyID] = @CompanyID and [ConditionPeriodID] = @PeriodID and [LineNbr] = @RepeatStart
SET @PeriodID = format(dateadd(month, -1, cast(concat(@PeriodID, '01') as date)), 'yyyyMM') SET @RepeatStart = @RepeatStart + 1 END END GO
